mapper.sql: his_id, story_name, story_note, trade_type, trade_status, deals_status, recorded_way, paying_status, agent_no, agent_name, pos_type, clo_quick, terminal_no, trade_time, trade_code, consume_type, consume_card_id, card_sort, trade_amount, trade_fee, card_type, authen_status, card_bank, back_code, back_msg, flow_status, supper_trade, both_free, activity_name, pay_channel
mapper.select:
select
from trade_history where 1 = 1
AND trade_status = #{tradeStatus}
AND card_bank LIKE concat('%',#{cardBank},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into trade_history (his_id, story_name, story_note, trade_type, trade_status, deals_status, recorded_way, paying_status, agent_no, agent_name, pos_type, clo_quick, terminal_no, trade_time, trade_code, consume_type, consume_card_id, card_sort, trade_amount, trade_fee, card_type, authen_status, card_bank, back_code, back_msg, flow_status, supper_trade, both_free, activity_name, pay_channel ) values (#{hisId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storyNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordedWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloQuick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumeCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authenStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supperTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bothFree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
